Sequence diagram in Jira Gives user story technical insights by providing design solutions using various patterns Experience to monitor APIs performance using KIBANA and enhance the APIs Performed communityofpractice sessions a weekly bestpractices meeting Implemented feature tests following every story using Gherkin and the Specflow testing framework Frontend development on various web products using AngularJS as well as MVC and Silverlight applications Participated in coaching program provided technical and career guidance to junior developers Sr Lead Net Developer United Airlines
